participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

EDEQ_01.LongName: Have you been deliberately <u>trying</u> to limit the amount of food you eat to influence your shape or weight (whether or not you have succeeded)?

EDEQ_02.LongName: Have you gone for long periods of time (8 waking hours or more) without eating anything at all in order to influence your shape or weight?

EDEQ_03.LongName: Have you <u>tried</u> to exclude from your diet any foods that you like in order to influence your shape or weight (whether or not you have succeeded)?

EDEQ_04.LongName: Have you <u>tried</u> to follow definite rules regarding your eating (for example, a calorie limit) in order to influence your shape or weight (whether or not you have succeeded)?

EDEQ_05.LongName: Have you had a definite desire to have an <u> empty</u> stomach with the aim of influencing your shape or weight?

EDEQ_06.LongName: Have you had a definite desire to have a <u>totally flat</u> stomach?

EDEQ_07.LongName: Has thinking about <u>food, eating or calories</u> made it very difficult to concentrate on things you are interested in (for example, working, following a conversation, or reading)?

EDEQ_08.LongName: Has thinking about <u>shape or weight</u> made it very difficult to concentrate on things you are interested in (for example, working, following a conversation, or reading)?

EDEQ_9.LongName: Have you had a definite fear of losing control over eating?

EDEQ_10.LongName: Have you had a definite fear that you might gain weight?

EDEQ_12.LongName: Have you had a strong desire to lose weight?

EDEQ_13.LongName: Over the past 28 days, how many <u>times</u> have you eaten what other people would regard as an <u>unusually large amount of food </u> (given the circumstances)?

EDEQ_14.LongName: . . .On how many of these times did you have a sense of having lost control over your eating (at the time that you were eating)?

EDEQ_15.LongName: Over the past 28 days, on how many DAYS have such episodes of overeating occurred (i.e., you have eaten an unusually large amount of food and have had a sense of loss of control at the time)?

EDEQ_16.LongName: Over the past 28 days, how many <u>times</u> have you made yourself sick (vomit) as a means of controlling your shape or weight?

EDEQ_17.LongName: Over the past 28 days, how many <u>times</u> have you taken laxatives as a means of controlling your shape or weight?

EDEQ_18.LongName: Over the past 28 days, how many <u>times</u> have you exercised in a "driven" or "compulsive" way as a means of controlling your weight, shape or amount of fat, or to burn off calories?

EDEQ_19.LongName: Over the past 28 days, on how many days have you eaten in secret (ie, furtively)? . . . Do not count episodes of binge eating

EDEQ_20.LongName: On what proportion of the times that you have eaten have you felt guilty (felt that you've done wrong) because of its effect on your shape or weight? . . . Do not count episodes of binge eating

EDEQ_21.LongName: Over the past 28 days, how concerned have you been about other people seeing you eat? . . . Do not count episodes of binge eating

EDEQ_22.LongName: Has your <u>weight</u> influenced how you think about (judge) yourself as a person?

EDEQ_23.LongName: Has your <u>shape</u> influenced how you think about (judge) yourself as a person?

EDEQ_24.LongName: How much would it have upset you if you had been asked to weigh yourself once a week (no more, or less, often) for the next four weeks?

EDEQ_25.LongName: How dissatisfied have you been with your <u>weight</u>?

EDEQ_26.LongName: How dissatisfied have you been with your <u>shape</u>?

EDEQ_27.LongName: How uncomfortable have you felt seeing your body (for example, seeing your shape in the mirror, in a shop window reflection, while undressing or taking a bath or shower)?

EDEQ_28.LongName: How uncomfortable have you felt about <u>others</u> seeing your shape or figure (for example, in communal changing rooms, when swimming, or wearing tight clothes)?

EDEQ_29.LongName: What is your weight at present? (DO NOT CHANGE IF FILLED IN-CLICK NEXT QUESTION)

EDEQ_30.LongName: What is your height ?(DO NOT CHANGE IF FILLED IN-CLICK NEXT QUESTION)

EDEQ_32.LongName: Over the past three-to-four months have you missed any menstrual periods?

EDEQ_35.Description: Mean of the scores for items 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5.Items are rated on a 7-point scale from 0-No days to 6-Everyday, therefore the resultant score should range from 0-30. | Calculation = ([EDEQ_01] + [EDEQ_02] + [EDEQ_03] + [EDEQ_04] + [EDEQ_05])/5

EDEQ_36.Description: Mean of the scores for items 7, 9, 19, 21, and 20. Items are rated on a 7-point scale from 0-No days to 6-Everyday, therefore the resultant score should range from 0-30. | Calculation = ([EDEQ_07] + [EDEQ_9] + [EDEQ_19] + [EDEQ_21] + [EDEQ_20])/5

EDEQ_37.Description: Mean of the scores for items 6, 8, 10, 11, 23, 26, 27, 28. Items are rated on a 7-point scale from 0-No days to 6-Everyday, therefore the resultant score should range from 0-48. | Calculation = ([EDEQ_06] + [EDEQ_08] + [EDEQ_23] + [EDEQ_10] + [EDEQ_26] + [EDEQ_27] + [EDEQ_28] + [EDEQ_11])/8

EDEQ_38.Description: Mean of the scores for items 8, 12, 22, 24, 25. Items are rated on a 7-point scale from 0-No days to 6-Everyday, therefore the resultant score should range from 0-48. | Calculation = ([EDEQ_22] + [EDEQ_24] + [EDEQ_08] + [EDEQ_25] + [EDEQ_12])/5
